text: Donald William 'Bob' Johnston (May 14, 1932 â€“ August 14, 2015) was an American record producer. He was best known for his work with Bob Dylan, Johnny Cash, Leonard Cohen, and Simon and Garfunkel. He was born in Hillsboro, Texas. Johnston died in Nashville, Tennessee, aged 83. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2015 deaths Category:People from Hillsboro, Texas Category:Businesspeople from Texas Category:American record producers
